name: Nightsiege
description:
Nightsiege Prepare your defenses and fight through the night. 
How many days can you survive?

Buildings

  • Plants: can be harvested for money in the morning
  • Walls: blocks enemies
  • Bombs: damages all enemies nearby 

Controls

  • WASD - movement
  • 1 - select Plant
  • 2 - select Wall
  • 3 - select Bomb
  • right click - select weapon
  • ESC / P - pause game
  • SPACE - begin night

Made in 2 days for ScoreSpace Jam #17 🕹️

Programming
